column2: #Check that language exposure adds up to 100 (+/- 1%)
#Assume NAs in language exposure are zeros
select(lab, subid, lang_group, session_error, notes, lang1, lang2, lang3, lang4, lang1_exposure, lang2_exposure, lang3_exposure, lang4_exposure) %>%
filter(total_exposure != 200) # These are babies with doubled rows
